name: Moonfin Settings Sync
overview: Synchronizes Moonfin settings across all Moonfin clients
description: Synchronizes Moonfin settings across all Moonfin clients (Android TV, Roku, Tizen, webOS, tvOS, Web). Provides server-side configuration for Jellyseerr integration and cross-device settings sync.

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- Settings synchronization across Moonfin clients
- Jellyseerr integration with admin configuration
- Device-aware configuration (mobile/desktop/TV)
